testUtterance: Ce texte permet de tester si ces voix en français sont à la hauteur de la tâche.

voices.label: Vivienne (France)
voices.name: Microsoft VivienneMultilingual Online (Natural) - French (France)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Denise (France)
voices.name: Microsoft Denise Online (Natural) - French (France)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. It can also be installed on Windows 11 but isn't currently accessible through the Web Speech API.

voices.label: Audrey (France)
voices.name: Audrey
voices.note: Audrey can be installed on all Apple devices and offers three variants. Like all voices that can be installed on Apple devices, it suffers from inconsistent naming due to localization.

voices.label: Aurélie (France)
voices.name: Aurélie
voices.note: Aurélie can be installed on all Apple devices and offers two variants. Like all voices that can be installed on Apple devices, it suffers from inconsistent naming due to localization.

voices.label: Thomas (France)
voices.name: Thomas
voices.note: While this is meant to identify the highest quality variant for the voice, it can be difficult to do so due to inconsistencies in how voices are exposed to browsers through the Web Speech API. Since the lowest quality of the voice is pre-loaded on Apple devices, the situation is worse than with other voices that need to be installed.

voices.label: Voix Google féminine (France)
voices.name: Google français
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Chrome on desktop. Utterances that are longer than 14 seconds long can trigger a bug with this voice, check the notes in the project's README for more information.

voices.label: Julie (France)
voices.name: Microsoft Julie - French (France)
voices.note: This voices is pre-loaded in Windows 10 and 11. While it's nowhere nearly as good as Microsoft's Natural Voices, it's good to have this voice listed as a fallback

voices.label: Voix féminine 1 (France)
voices.name: Google français 4 (Natural)
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to natural voice and offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google fr-fr-x-frc-network
Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google fr-fr-x-frc-local

voices.label: Voix française
voices.name: français France
voices.note: On Android, voice selection is only supported at a system level and Web Speech API doesn't return a true list of voices available, just a list of languages and regions
